verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:18
verses.text: And his sister Hammoleketh bare Ishod, and Abiezer, and Mahalah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:19
verses.text: And the sons of Shemida were, Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:20
verses.text: And the sons of Ephraim; Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and Eladah his son, and Tahath his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:21
verses.text: And Zabad his son, and Shuthelah his son, and Ezer, and Elead, whom the men of Gath that were born in that land slew, because they came down to take away their cattle.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 7:22
verses.text: And Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brethren came to comfort him.
